mapper.select: select * from playboard order by f_number desc
mapper.insert: insert into playboard (f_number, writer, title, content,b_like, b_dislike ) values (playboard_seq.nextval, #{param1},#{param2},#{param3}, 0 ,0)
mapper.update: update playboard set writer =#{param1}, title=#{param2}, content=#{param3} where f_number = #{param4}
update playboard set b_like=b_like+1 where f_number = #{param4}
update playboard set b_dislike=b_dislike+1 where f_number = #{param4}
update playboard set b_like=b_like-1 where f_number = #{param4}
update playboard set b_dislike=b_dislike-1 where f_number = #{param4}
